short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spaghetti Bug Fixes and Features that nobody asked for!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will:
- allow you to set a custom background image for ffs.gg
- allow you to see how long -ffs-Renkon has been inactive for
- notify you of Shooter drama in the shoutbox ðŸ¤¡
